H0.text: The TV presenter Sir Patrick Moore, CBE, was a keen amateur musician, composing and playing pieces for which instrument. Piano

H1.text: The TV presenter Sir Patrick Moore, CBE, was a keen amateur musician, composing and playing pieces for which instrument. Violin

H2.text: The TV presenter Sir Patrick Moore, CBE, was a keen amateur musician, composing and playing pieces for which instrument. Cello

H3.text: The TV presenter Sir Patrick Moore, CBE, was a keen amateur musician, composing and playing pieces for which instrument. XYL

A4.text: He was a keen pianist and accomplished xylophone player

A5.text: He composed a substantial corpus of works, including two operettas
